create table article ( id bigint generated by default as identity, created_at timestamp(6) not null, created_by varchar(100) not null, modified_at timestamp(6) not null, modified_by varchar(100) not null, content varchar(10000) not null, title varchar(255) not null, user_id varchar(50) not null, primary key (id) ) Hibernate:
